origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_compliance_report', 'description': 'This function provides a compliance report for an insurance company based on the company name and the type of report requested.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the insurance company.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of compliance report, e.g., current, historical.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The compliance report for the specified insurance company.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_compliance_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyName'是'中国平安保险公司', 'reportType'是'historical'.
